'''Tale of the Moonlight''' is a [[Diagram]] obtained from [[Aravinay]] in exchange for one [[Stories of You and the Aranara]]. Once used, it allows the player to [[Forging|forge]] the 4-Star [[polearm]] [[Moonpiercer]].
